localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Lullaby helps treat Tinnitus, a condition that makes you hear a very annoying sound for the rest of your life. Most of the ENTs I checked with seemed poorly prepared to help their patients with the stress, so the app teaches you a healthy way to do that.
blogPost.body: Lullaby helps treat Tinnitus, a condition that makes you hear a very annoying sound for the rest of your life. Most of the ENTs I checked with seemed poorly prepared to help their patients with the stress, so the app teaches you a healthy way to do that.
blogPost.title: Lullaby - Helps you treat Tinnitus, a chronic health condition
blogPost.author: Roberto González

localize.description: 摇篮曲有助于治疗耳鸣，这是一种让你在余生中听到非常恼人的声音的情况。我检查过的大多数耳鼻喉科医生似乎都没有准备好帮助他们的病人解决压力，所以这个应用程序教你一个健康的方法。
localize.tagline: 帮助您治疗慢性病--耳鸣。

localize.description: 搖籃曲有助於治療耳鳴，這是一種讓你在餘生中聽到非常惱人的聲音的情況。我檢查過的大多數耳鼻喉科醫生似乎都沒有準備好幫助他們的病人解決壓力，所以這個應用程序教你一個健康的方法。
localize.tagline: 幫助您治療慢性病--耳鳴。

previous.excerpt: Kanda is building Affirm for general contractors. We let builders offer their customers a pay monthly option when they want a remodel but don't want to pay the full price upfront. Backed by YC (W21).
previous.title: Kanda - Affirm for general contractors

localize.description: 康达正在为总承包商打造Affirm。我们让建筑商为他们的客户提供一个按月支付的选项，当他们想要改造但又不想预付全款时。得到了YC（W21）的支持。
康達正在爲總承包商打造Affirm。我們讓建築商爲他們的客戶提供一個按月支付的選項，當他們想要改造但又不想預付全款時。得到了YC（W21）的支持。

next.title: Covid-19 hospitalizations in the US have declined 54 days in a row, down 70% from their peak on Jan 6. 🙏 https://t.co/Vx4MqbWwAL

localize.full_text: 科维德-19在美国的住院人数已连续54天下降，比1月6日的峰值下降了70%。🙏 https://t.co/Vx4MqbWwAL。
科維德-19在美國的住院人數已連續54天下降，比1月6日的峯值下降了70%。🙏 https://t.co/Vx4MqbWwAL。
